title: coaching
body:
welcome, i am here to offer the people of league a 100% for sure way of getting better at the game.

i offer a high end league of legends coaching service that after just one session with me u will see a improvement in your game, you will not go from bronze to diamond in 1 day but if u use the tips and tricks and advice i give you, i know u will improve. i also offer team coaching, if you and your friend want to become better together

price :

$3 pay pal
$3 cs go gun skin

this is paid for every hour e.g

1 hour = $3
2 hour = $6
and so on and so on

if interested please add me and we can talk further
contacts

league = moteinner ( smurf, my main account friends list is full )
online = leave a comment bellow i check very half hour :)
skype = coreysbook123
